title: 10 Minute walk to Central & Kendall Sqs* NO FEE**
posting_body: sunny top floor  (1200 sq ft) totally renovated 7 years ago, 5BR/2Bath , short walk to Kendall sq & Central sqs.

Apartment with in-unit Washer & Dryer, modern Kitchen w/ Granite counters , Stainless steel appliances, all Hardwood floors, small porch off the kitchen, there's a large shared patio and BBQ area in the rear yard, and bike storage, BR's range in size (see attached floor plan), pets Negotiable ( $35/month for a cate, $85/ month for a dog).
rent is $5475/month, Note*** this apt doesn't have a separate Living room ( just a small area in the eat-in-kitchen (see the 3D video and picture of the floor plan attached)
We have a 3D video avail , here's the link: <URL>
We require good credit and First months, Last Months and one Months security deposit
NO FEE *** rent directly from the landlord /Call
